doUserTask
{
float one = 0.0;
float half = 0.0;
float two = 0.0;
float three = 0.0;
float halfhalf = 0.0;
float number5 = 0.0;
float number6 = 0.0;
float number7 = 0.0;
float number8 = 0.0;
float number9 = 0.0;

while(true)
{
	one = 3__melodyVolume*0.5;
	half = one/2;
	two = one*2;
	number6 = one+half;
	three = one*3;
	number8 = one/3;
	halfhalf = one/4;
	number5 = one/6;
	number7 = half+halfhalf;
	number9 = two+half;
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number8);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_S_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	// speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume*0.5);
	sleep(halfhalf);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume*0.5);
	sleep(halfhalf);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number7);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(halfhalf);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_7, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_S_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume*0.5);
	sleep(halfhalf);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume*0.5);
	sleep(halfhalf);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number7);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(halfhalf);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(number5);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, 0);
	sleep(__melodyVolume*0.50);

	sleep(1);
}
}
